summary: App requires a gated login (hardcoded credentials) and has a reported issue with the login button behavior.
architectural_notes: Gate all app/website content behind an authentication check; only allow access after successful login with the specified credentials.
known_issues: Login button is not working properly (user-reported).

existing_features.title: Change the branch login credentials to a single hardcoded username `bachupally` and password `branch1`, and ensure the login check works reliably (e.g., trim whitespace around inputs and compare case-insensitively for the username).

Gate the app so the main website/app UI cannot be accessed until the hardcoded branch credentials are entered and the user is authenticated via branch login (do not allow Internet Identity login to bypass this gate).
Fix the reported issue where the login button is not working properly by ensuring the Branch Login submit action consistently triggers authentication and provides clear feedback on success/failure.

new_feature_requests.summary: Require login with hardcoded username 'bachupally' and password 'branch1' before allowing access to the website
